title: Jonah Hill appears to be in a jolly mood as he puts his arm around his fiance Gianna Santos
text:
Jonah Hill was spotted out with his fiance Gianna Santos on Wednesday.

Also with The Wolf Of Wall Street actor was his mother Sharon Lyn Chalkin and father Richard Feldstein.

The party had just enjoyed dinner at the Palm Restaurant in Beverly Hills and they chatted happily outside the eatery.

Father and son: Jonah Hill walked with his arm around his dad Richard Feldstein' shoulder after dinner with fiance Gianna Santos and his mom Sharon Lyn Chalkin at the Palm Restaurant in Beverly Hills on Wednesday

Jonah, 35, walked with his arm around his dad's shoulder and his mom leaned in to talk to her future daughter-in-law.

The actor-director was dressed in a white polo shirt and jeans while Richard was more formally dressed in a white shirt and black pants.

Gianna, 30, flashed a glimpse of her tummy in a light brown, cropped, short-sleeved cardigan and baggy jeans, with her hair smoothed back into a tight bun.

She is the content manager at beauty start-up Violet Grey and previously served as head stylist and producer at hip fashion brand KITH.

Mom and daughter-in-law: Gianna, 30, flashed a glimpse of her tummy in a cropped cardigan and jeans while Sharon looked chic in a white blouse, black pants and white ankle boots

Sharon donned a white blouse and black pants with a ragged hem and white patent leather boots with her long brunette tresses cascading over her shoulder.

Jonah popped the question to Gianna in early September after a year of dating, slipping a huge diamond ring onto her finger.

Meanwhile, the Knocked Up star is the rumored new villain in director Matt Reeves' upcoming Batman movie, in which Robert Pattinson will play the Caped Crusader

So much in love: Jonah popped the question to Gianna in early September after a year of dating, slipping a huge diamond ring onto her finger

According to The Hollywood Reporter, James Bond star Jeffrey Wright will play Commissioner Gordon, taking over the role from JK Simmons, who played Gordon in the Ben Affleck-led Justice League.

However, Jeremy Irons is expected to reprise his role as butler Alfred Pennyworth in the film, which is due out on June 25.

Jonah is also one of the producers on Richard Jewell, which Clint Eastwood is directing and is currently in post-production. The drama is due out on December 13
description: The Wolf Of Wall Street star, 35,  was spotted out with Gianna, 30, and his mom and dad, Sharon Lyn Chalkin and Richard Feldstein, leaving Palm Restaurant in Beverly Hills on Wednesday.
